title: L'Heure de la Musique
marks: Signature LRC, in the print: [A LEPERE]
description: crowds seated in chair beneath trees, with couple seated at LLC; woman holding closed parasol looks toward crowds, man wearing top hat rests his chin on his walking stick; distant band on bandstand; sculpted urn on a pedestal behind woman in LLC; standing man at center leans against tree with his PR hand
